name: Tropical Palm Maxi Dress
brief_summary: A flowy maxi dress in vibrant green palm print. Perfect for a beach day or a casual brunch.

name: Pastel Sunset Mini Dress
brief_summary: Light and airy mini dress with a soft pastel watercolor print. Elegant summer wear.

name: Bohemian Tie-Dye Frock
brief_summary: A stylish V-neck tie-dye dress with a flattering silhouette, perfect for a relaxed look.

name: Citrus Burst Short Suit
brief_summary: Chic linen short set in a bright yellow print. Great for elevated casual outings.

name: Coral Hues Kaftan
brief_summary: An easy-to-wear kaftan in warm coral and orange tones. The ultimate comfortable resort wear.

name: Green Meadow Wrap Dress
brief_summary: A light green floral wrap dress. Versatile and feminine for day or evening.
